# The `StructLayout` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Used to lazily calculate structure layout information for a target machine, based on the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/datalayout">DataLayout</a> structure. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::StructLayout</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

Used to lazily calculate structure layout information for a target machine, based on the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/datalayout">DataLayout</a> structure.

Definition at line 567 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/datalayout-h">DataLayout.h</a>.

### hasPadding() {#a2ab4cc5d5ab9f9feb8139e528e02c774}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool llvm::StructLayout::hasPadding () const"
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Returns whether the struct has padding or not between its fields.

NB: Padding in nested element is not taken into account.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/datalayout-h/#l00582">582</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/datalayout-h">DataLayout.h</a>.
